name: io.github.somacoffeekyoto/imgx
description: AI image generation and editing via CLI or MCP. Text-based editing, multi-provider.

environmentVariables.description: Gemini API key from Google AI Studio. Optional if configured via 'imgx config set api-key'.
environmentVariables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key. Optional if configured via 'imgx config set api-key --provider openai'.
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
